description: This file demonstrates how to search for user memories using different retrieval methods, including last_n, first_n, and semantic (agentic) search, utilizing a memory management system with a database backend and external models.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: A class for managing user memories, supporting addition and retrieval using various methods.

classes.name: UserMemory
classes.description: A class representing a user's memory entry.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: A class for SQLite database backend for storing memories.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for the Gemini language model used in memory processing.

methods.name: add_user_memory
methods.description: Adds a user memory to the system.

methods.name: search_user_memories
methods.description: Searches for user memories using specified retrieval methods.
